entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of showers. Temperature steady near plus 4. POP 40%
entry.summary: Periods of rain mixed with light wet snow ending this morning then cloudy with 40 percent chance of rain showers. Periods of snow inland this morning. Snowfall amount 2 cm inland. Wind becoming southeast 30 km/h this morning except gusting to 50 near the Strait of Georgia. Temperature steady near plus 4. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Wednesday 01 February 2023
